Plot:
-----
A retarded man is unjustly accused of attacking a young girl. Disguised 
as a scarecrow, he hides in a cornfield, only to be hunted down and shot. 
Later, after it is revealed he saved the girl from a vicious dog attack,
members of the search posse are killed by a mysterious scarecrow.

Trama:
------
